comparisonRules.allowComparison: A comparison is performed only if the question's 'comparable' flag is true and data are available for both survey years for the comparable markets.
comparisonRules.fallback: If data exist in only one survey year, return that single dataset without attempting a comparison.
comparisonRules.lookupLogic: The chatbot will first query this index by question ID to determine comparability. For comparable questions, only data from the markets listed in 'comparableMarkets' will be used. If a user requests data for markets outside this list, the provided 'userMessage' will be displayed.
